question:
Which among the following is / are true about Iqtadari system 
1. Iqta system was based upon salary during the reign of Firoz Shah Tughlaq.
2. In the beginning , Iqta system was hereditary.
Select the correct option from the codes given below
explanation: The Iqta system was provided institutional status by Iltutmish and later this system bacame the main stay of the sultanate administration under the slave dynasty. In the beginning, an Iqta was based upon salary. Later, under Firoz Shah Tughlaq it bacame hereditary.
